Clovis.Fort Camp, California: Fort Camp (also, Forthcamp) is a former settlement in Fresno County, California. It was located on the Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railroad and the Fresno Interurban Railroad 4.25 miles (6.8 km) south-southeast of Clovis, at an elevation of 341 feet (104 m). It still appeared on maps as of 1923.
